FAQ
(Q) Where are these VPS node located?
(A) Scanton PA, Los Angeles, CA or Manchester UK (Soon FL)

(Q) Do you have Test IP's?
(A) Yes we do. Do open a sales ticket with us or email sales {@} fehosting.com

(Q) How do i get the Free DirectAdmin?
(A) If you would like the FREE copy of Directadmin you will need to add it to the order note’s and post the URL to this Ad!

(Q) How long does it take to have my VPS setup?
(A) Server's are setup right after payment is sent. However due to DA licensing which has to be done manually it can take up to 1-4 hours for the control panel to actually be installed, If any Control Panel is ordered will delay the setup as we install each Panel manually.

(Q) Will you transfer my data from my current host?
(A) Yes! We can provide transfer assistance Please open a ticket with support after your order with your current host login info (Only cPanel/WHM to cPanel/WHM servers).

(Q) TUN/TAP Drivers
(A) If you require TUN/TAP to be enabled on your VPS, simply drop us a support ticket. (OpenVZ Only)

(Q) Payment Methods
(A) We accept Credit/Debit cards (AlertPlay) and PayPal/2Checkout.

Managed Services:
